content: gomer is the second in my fugly monsters collection the fugly monsters are inspired by my love of the fugglers dolls you will need worsted weight yarn in at least two colors the main color and a contrast color for the belly patch and inner mouth a thinner yarn in white for the teeth 5mm hook - 3 5mm hook for the teeth safety eyes - or you can crochet them or stitch them on stitch markers scissors & a needle for weaving in your ends at the end of the main pattern i have included instructions for all of the optional pieces or alterations i made for them the pattern has not been tested i did double check everything but please feel free to message me with any questions
